short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets the user selected gzipped text on the page and displays the inflated/decoded string in the popup. New Icon per user request.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gets the user selected gzipped text block (usually found in modern day logging systems like Kibana and ES) on the page displays the inflated/decoded string in the popup.
Updated/changed icon as per user requests.
